scripts.android-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --dev false --reset-cache --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.ios-bundle: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios --assets-dest ios/
